sentence.Network_en: The exhibition is informative, up to date, and mercifully free of gimmicks.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个展览既能让人增长见识，又紧跟时代前沿，而且幸运的是没有华而不实的东西。

sentence.Network_en: St Lucia is still mercifully undeveloped as a tourist destination.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为一个旅游目的地，圣卢西亚所幸还未被开发。

sentence.Network_en: Bolivia has been mercifully free of large-scale, drug-related violence.
sentence.Network_cn: 幸运的是，玻利维亚没有发生过与毒品有关的大规模暴力事件。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 超纲词汇 - 明明的日志 - 网易博客 ... memento n. 纪念品 mercifully ad. 宽厚地，幸运地 microbiologist n. 微生物学家.
综合英语单词表(第二册下) - 豆丁网 ... leisure n. 闲暇；空闲时间 mercifully ad. 仁慈地 momentary a. 短暂的；瞬息的.
★2012专四参考答案... ... (catch on 流行) 69. (=mercifully) (上帝仁慈所以幸运) 77. (wedding banquet 婚宴) 68.
考研阅读精读笔记_一舟_新浪博客... ... fail to do 未能；无法 mercifully ad. 幸亏，好在，幸运的是 merciful a. 仁慈的，宽大的.

list.abs: mercifully , the weather help up .幸亏天气帮忙.

he also mercifully condescended to reveal Himself and His ways to Moses ( because of their intimate relationship ) , and He showed His mighty deeds to the children of Israel .祂也本著爱心向摩西启示祂自己及祂的道（出于祂与摩西的亲密关系)，而且祂向以色列的后裔展示祂强力的作为。
he dealt with the thief mercifully .他对待那个小偷很宽容。
However , God mercifully gave Judah more time to repent ., 不过 , 上帝已经仁慈的给犹大更多时间悔改了.

entry.def: You can use mercifully to show that you are glad that something good has happened, or that something bad has not happened or has stopped.

example.ex: Mercifully, a friend came to the rescue...
example.tran: 幸好一个朋友赶来解了围。

example.ex: Bolivia has been mercifully free of large-scale, drug-related violence.
example.tran: 幸运的是，玻利维亚没有发生过与毒品有关的大规模暴力事件。

means.word_mean: 1. in a manner that may be cruel but avoids suffering;

sentences.sentence: "we more mercifully had our bouncing betties go off at the head"

auth_sentence.content: Mercifully, however, some of us use rationale.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mercifully, however, some of us use rationale.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mercifully, however, some of us use rationale.

auth_sentence.content: The episodes are violent and appalling but mercifully brief.
auth_sentence.res_content: The episodes are violent and appalling but mercifully brief.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The episodes are violent and appalling but mercifully brief.

auth_sentence.content: I was mercifully too young to be embarrassed.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was mercifully too young to be embarrassed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was mercifully too young to be embarrassed.

sentences.en: The wait was mercifully brief, little more than an hour.
sentences.cn: 幸好等待的时间很短，不过一个小时多一点。

sentences.en: It was a mercifully quick end for those condemned to die.
sentences.cn: 对于那些死刑犯来说，这是一种仁慈的快速解脱。
